title: Building for end times: the boom in bunkers
description: Threat of nuclear war and a global pandemic have spurred a boom in individuals purchasing survival bunkers, says author Bradley Garrett. Help support our independent journalism at theguardian.com/infocus
episode: Building for end times: the boom in bunkers
